---
title: "Survey Operations -- General Information"
output: html_document
---

```{r, results = 'asis', echo = F}

## Subset the records in the spreadsheet that just refer to the 
##     Work Environment Section within the Safety Tab

sub_docs <- subset(x = full_site0, 
                   page == "survey_ops" & sub_page == "general_info")

## Simply attach the hyperlink of the document to the label that shows up
##      on the website. 
string <- ""

for (irow in 1:nrow(sub_docs)) {
  string <- paste0(string,
            paste0("[", sub_docs$title[irow], "](../",
                   sub_docs$url_loc[irow], ")", "<br><br>")
            )
}

## Print the string
cat(string)
```
